EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sounds good thanks! Sara From: Sherry Fraser [mailto:fraspeb@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 3:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Onboarding a new consultant to MBO Hi Sara, Thanks for reaching out to me. I'll look at the video tonight, and schedule a time to talk to you later this week. Thanks, Sherry Sent from my iPhone On Jul 25, 2012, at 9:54 AM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Sheerry, Nice to meet you via email. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mark Spoor [mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com] <mailto:[mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com]> Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 12:52 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Nicolette Taylor; Sherry Fraser (fraspeb@hotmail.com <mailto:fraspeb@hotmail.com>) Subject: RE: Onboarding a new consultant to MBO Cool. Thanks. I have ccd Sherry Fraser (Consultant) in this email. Cheers, MARK <image001.jpg>Mark Spoor Vice President Talentp. (303) 376-6276 c. (303) 669-9107 1512 Larimer, Suite 710 Denver, Colorado 80202 www.envision-bc.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.envision-bc.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>mspoor@envision-bc.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> The best way to stay in touch with Mark is to link with him on LinkedIn. http://www.linkedin.com/in/mspoor <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/in/mspoor?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 10:45 AM To: Mark Spoor Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: Onboarding a new consultant to MBO Hi Mark, You may give her my contact details and name. My page is http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - she can even schedule a call with me on the page. Thanks!Sara From: Mark Spoor [mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 12:15 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Onboarding a new consultant to MBO Sara  We have a new consultant who would like to onboard to one of our projects through MBO. Is it ok to give her your name as a contact point? Do you have a landing page for background info or should we give her Nicolettes? Thanks, MARK <image002.jpg>Mark Spoor Vice President Talentp.
